Author: Lynchpin Token
Title: (ANN) (ICO) Lynchpin (LYN) token Official - Making digital assets spendable
Body: Veregig This just needs simple common sense. If you know how to understand the simple analogy of supply vs demand, you could simply go to coinmarketcap and look at the coin/tokens with large supply vs those with low supply and you will find the answer. Look at the chart, look at the analysis .This would show you that with adoption a low supply coin/token project will stand to increase more than a high supply coin/token project.

Author: Lynchpin Token
Title: (ANN) (ICO) Lynchpin (LYN) token Official - Making digital assets spendable
Body: For sure one should invest after doing due diligence but one should not if they dont have the brain capacity to understand simple tokenomics and how the market works.  One should also be able to understand what the project offers, what kind of technology in place and how does it help adoption of the token. If one fail to understand all these, then they should not buy the tokens.  And if you have been in the crypto market long enough, you would understand that there is no project as such that offer what our project offer. It takes alot of time, effort and investment to come out with all the technologies that we have implemented and do you think that the money that was raised in our public sale is enough to implement it? It was what we raise in our private sale with VCs that is making it possible for us to initiate the project faster than any ICO out there.  And this is the excact reason why we stopped the 3rd phase ICO, just for your info.  So before you think that you are better than the rest, i would suggest you to do some research on the technologies we are implementing and what it takes for it to be launched? Example for the QR code security enviroment, how much do you think it cost to get it PCI DSS certified? Just buying up a firewall is in the range of 6 figures and we are not even talking about servers, front end developement, backend developement, unique qr code generator whether its static or dynamic and many many more.  And what iam talking about is just QR code wallet? What about Qr code payment gateway? What about POS? What about debit card solution?  Do you think you have what it takes to ask me questions pertaining my technologies or project? I am open for your questions

Title: (ANN) (ICO) Lynchpin (LYN) token Official - Making digital assets spendable
Body: Thanks, many tokens from the top 100 of coinmarket cap has no real project and based only from hype. A good token is backed with projects using its coin.

Author: Lynchpin Token
Title: (ANN) (ICO) Lynchpin (LYN) token Official - Making digital assets spendable
Body: Maybe you are confused because you don't understand the article well. What we meant was looking at our tokenomics. With 5 million supply and 3 million locked for the 1st year and no free tokens given out which free our tokens from dumping. Don't you think this gives stability to the concept for the 1 year and based on the concept of supply vs demand more adoption brings on stability for an estimated increase on the value of the token ? Compare to most stable tokens which are pegged to USD and it goes +/- 2-5% fluctuations.  And also true basis of stable coin format is those assets that it is pegged to must be available for audit in a custodian party, til date I see none and if that concept can be term stable concept I believe our concept could be termed as stable too for the first year and the natural price increase comes in form the natural adoption.

Author: Lynchpin Token
Title: (ANN) (ICO) Lynchpin (LYN) token Official - Making digital assets spendable
Body: When will dumping occur? When they get coins/tokens for free or for for a price where it does not hurt them financially. It can also happen when there is panic in the market and investors selling for a price lower than what they bought. With 2 million tokens out for the first 12 months and every single one of them bought for usd4.5 to usd5 each, we doubt that it will be dump because of panic as there are so many case use for the Lyn tokens. Every single new demand for the token because of its use case will not decrease the value but increase it. No mining or staking, no free tokens given out for bounties or airdrops. These are simple and logical analogy that makes these tokens safe for dumpers because they is no instance created for dumping.

Author: Lynchpin Token
Title: (ANN) (ICO) Lynchpin (LYN) token Official - Making digital assets spendable
Body: Point of sale works either on Qr code or NFC payment method. You do not need tie up with Visa or Masters with that. you only need to use visa and masters network when you use their network for EMV or Magnectic swipe transactions. When you have Qr code or NFC payment, you are creating your own network which you work with your custodian bank.

Author: Lynchpin Token
Title: (ANN) (ICO) Lynchpin (LYN) token Official - Making digital assets spendable
Body: Hi bad bunny, We are ready for real world solutions. Our debit card is out and we are making sure that the 2nd version has NFC payments on it so that we do not need to spend more money replace cards we issued out without NFC solution. NFC is an important part of our structure as we are creating our own network with it and earning thru it in fiat currency. The demand for the tokens will come from direct payments with crypto or Lyn tokens being used as a loyalty redemption tool. All revenues comes in are essential for expansion and salaries of employees who make the structure work. We have already applied for SVF and E money licenses for our QR code payment solution and will take a few months to realise this. Our wallets are ready to integrate, our loyalty retention program GBB points are ready for fiat transactions and when points are collected, redemption on gobuybid.com is always GBB points and LYN tokens as Gobuybid only accepts LYN tokens as form of payment.

Author: Lynchpin Token
Title: (ANN) (ICO) Lynchpin (LYN) token Official - Making digital assets spendable
Body: Hi alfaisal890 Who says we will be pegging our coin mainly to BTC? Our team is thinking to peg most of our trading to stable coins so that any adoption that comes in will benefit the value of our token. We do not want to ride the volatility of the market with all our efforts. And when you talk about profits, look at our project clearly and understand it. Most of our project goes into fiat transactions, example our QR code payment we have 2 payment solution. One for merchants who will accept Lyn tokens for goods and services but before merchants would accept your crypto don't you think you would need to convince them on the volatility of your token and on top of that liquidity of your token? Second payment solution is Qr code for fiat payments, when we deal with this in individual countries, we do not go against the grain of forcing crypto to replace fiat which never be possible unless the utility proposition is equivalent to fiat. Lyn tokens would be used as a loyalty redemption for it's retention program.

Author: Lynchpin Token
Title: (ANN) (ICO) Lynchpin (LYN) token Official - Making digital assets spendable
Body: Welcome all new members to LynchPin (Lyn) Token Official Bitcointalk community group! The best place to stay up to date and ask questions.   Please respect our thread rules - Keep topics relevant to LynchPin (LYN) Token - Post in English Language - Be respectful to all users in the group - Spamming or personal advertisement will be at risk of being removed  Attention!! Please be careful about scammers via bitcointalk or any other social media platforms trying to ask you to send money to any address in exchange for LynchPin (LYN) Tokens.  Official channels for Lynchpin are * Bitcointalk ANN * Twitter * Telegram * Facebook * Website * Linkedin   Tokenomics Name: Lynchpin Symbol: LYN Token technology: ERC20 Decimal point: 18 Total supply: 5 million tokens - 2 million private sale - 2 million public sale - 1 million for the team  Price - Public phase 1 - $4.50 per token (November 15 to December 23, 2018) - Public phase 2 - $4.75 per token (January 1 to February 26, 2019) - Public phase 3 - $5.00 per token (March 1 to May 1, 2019)  Vision To create a token that solves - Volatility - lack of intrinsic value - Inflation & deflation - lack of utility  Points to take note The tokens for team and private sale are locked for 12 months but for public there is no lock up. The reason for the 12 months lock up is to give the team ample time to grow the business and push out for adoption.  We do not offer bounty and no free tokens given out for marketing. This stops bounty hunters from dumping when the token is listed on exchange after ICO which is what most ICOs are facing even if they launch a successful product  Our focus on our project is making digital assets spendable. The lack of such focus in the industry have made cryptocurrency as a speculative trading tool in the market. Almost USD600 billion have gone out from the total market cap of the industry which is bad.  The token and project is focused more on utility propositions which is lacking in cryptocurrencies. Our job is to build intrinsic value so that our token holds for its value to be used as payment for goods and services.  Lynpay payment solution focuses making digital assets spendable thru our debit card and P.O.S terminals which accepts BTC/ETH/LYN as mode of payments. We are providing 2-3 tiers of exclusive metal debit cards and 1-2 tiers of plastic cards. The metal debit cards comes with a lot of benefits like airport lounge access, Invites to exclusive events and parties worldwide, tailored made concierge service and many more.  For anyone to apply our debit card, they have to pay a subscription fee with LYN tokens only or they can hold a certain number of tokens for 6 months before being issued with the card. We will also be launching an affiliate program where we will pay up to usd100 in tokens for every new member recommended. VIP metal debit cards will be issued to outstanding affiliate as a reward.  The POS machines will serve as a payment gateway using cryptocurrencies directly which ultimately has a total lower transaction cost. As you can see worldwide especially in china, it shows you how effective just with the phone and an app you are able to make payments for goods and services.  We have also partnered with Gobuybid.com where you can use your tokens to make purchases for premium products on the website. Every month there will be a black Friday sale on the website where the previous month’s stock can go up to 80% discount from normal price.  We have also partnered with RMP games where Lyn tokens can be used to pay for purchases on the website.    LYNCHPIN (LYN) TOKEN  WEBSITE  || LINKEDIN  || TWITTER  || FACEBOOK  || TELEGRAM
